name: Fuddo and Slam
overview: Fuddo and Slam is a parody based on The Lord of the Rings. It takes place after Bulbo gambled away his ring, and his friends Fuddo and Slam had to retrieve it. It's a sequel to An Everyday Tale of a Seeker of Gold and forms a part of The Balrogian Trilogy. The game was designed by John Wilson and Shaun G. McClure.
